,tbpost.title ,tbpost.author ,tbpost.content FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id = #{id}

SELECT count(tbpost.id) as listsize FROM tbpost WHERE tbpost.id is not NULL AND tbpost.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbpost.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbpost.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{author}, '%')
